name: Tienda Crypto
headline: Crypto Exchange and Payment API Gateway
description: Tienda Dólar is the best way for Latin American people to protect their savings

founders.name: Federico Goldberg, Founder
founders.description:
Hey, I am the CEO of TiendaCrypto. 
I have a degree in Industrial Engineering and worked 6 years in logistics in a cargo airline company. 
I have sold a previous logistic company in 2017 called Sherpals and during 2018, we built a smart contract game for the World Cup which was a success in the crypto community. 

We built Tienda Dólar, the first digital exchange in Argentina (exchanging ARS into USD) with a volume of 6 MM usd/month and we are now adding Stock/bonds and crypto to our platform.

founders.name: Nicolas D'Onofrio, Founder
founders.description: Passionate tech founder, i love solving problems through teamwork and hard work.

#### El lugar más simple para comprar y vender criptomonedas
# Protegé tus ahorros con criptomonedas
.
![](https://www.tiendacrypto.com/assets/apple.svg)
App Store
![](https://www.tiendacrypto.com/assets/play-store.svg)
Google PlayVersión web
![left arrow](https://www.tiendacrypto.com/assets/chevron-left.svg)
![left arrow](https://www.tiendacrypto.com/assets/chevron-right.svg)
## Nuestros servicios
![EXCHANGE](https://www.tiendacrypto.com/assets/carrou_company_commerce.svg)
### API Commerce
  * Cobra en crypto, QR online o Físico
  * Establece los precios en pesos, dólares o criptomonedas.
  * Integración con API o plataformas de Ecommerce (WooCommerce, Shopify, etc)


[Cobrar con cripto](https://www.tiendacrypto.com/</commerce>)
![EXCHANGE](https://www.tiendacrypto.com/assets/carrou_company_b2b.svg)
### Exchange as a service
  * API Plug & Play
  * Vende crypto a tus clientes, nosotros nos encargamos de la parte legal
  * Mejores precios y liquidez


[Ver más](https://www.tiendacrypto.com/</b2b>)
![EXCHANGE](https://www.tiendacrypto.com/assets/carrou_company_otc.svg)
### OTC
  * Montos mayoristas
  * Liquidez y precio
  * Atención personal


[Contactanos](https://www.tiendacrypto.com/</empresas>)
## Segura, fácil y con la mejor atención
Comprá y vendé en instantes, con acreditaciones inmediatas y el mejor soporte del mercado
![Hero](https://www.tiendacrypto.com)
## Simple y rápido
Operá velozmente. Realizá la compra/venta del activo que vos quieras en tan solo un click.
![Hero](https://www.tiendacrypto.com)
## Seguridad y privacidad
Realizamos las acreditaciones en el acto ya que estamos conectados al sistema bancario reconociendo tu depósito con tu Cuit.
![Hero](https://www.tiendacrypto.com)
## Atención personalizada
Lo más importante sos vos. Ese es el pilar de la Tienda. Siempre vas a encontrar un agente dispuesto a ayudarte y a acompañarte en el proceso en caso de necesitarlo.
![dashboard screenshot](https://www.tiendacrypto.com/assets/security.svg)
### ¡Empezá a operar en 3 simples pasos!
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%27250%27%20height=%27250%27/%3e)![Hero](https://www.tiendacrypto.com)
1. Creá tu cuenta
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%27250%27%20height=%27250%27/%3e)![Hero](https://www.tiendacrypto.com)
2. Cargá dinero
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%27250%27%20height=%27250%27/%3e)![Hero](https://www.tiendacrypto.com)
3. Explorá e invertí
Comenzar
![Hero](https://www.tiendacrypto.com)© 2025 TiendaCrypto
[Inicio](https://www.tiendacrypto.com/</>)

![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%2750%27%20height=%2750%27/%3e)![Hero](https://www.tiendacrypto.com)
“SIXALIME S.A.S.- Proveedor de Servicios de Activos Virtuales (PSAV) inscripto bajo el N°21 de fecha 16 de mayo de 2024 en el Registro de Proveedores de Servicios de Activos Virtuales de CNV. Este registro es a los fines del control como Sujeto Obligado ante la Unidad de Información Financiera (UIF) y de todo otro ente regulador facultado a tal efecto, en el marco de sus competencias, y no implica licencia ni supervisión por parte de la COMISIÓN NACIONAL DE VALORES sobre la actividad realizada por el PSAV”.

generated_description:
### Tienda Crypto: Your Gateway to Cryptocurrency

**Overview**  
Founded in 2020, Tienda Crypto is redefining how Latin Americans engage with cryptocurrency. Originating as Tienda Dólar, the company’s mission is simple yet impactful: to serve as a crypto exchange and payment API gateway, helping individuals and businesses protect their savings and embrace digital currencies. 

**Location and Team**  
Based in Buenos Aires, Argentina, Tienda Crypto has a dedicated team of 20 employees, all driven by a shared vision for a more accessible financial future. They are a proud member of Y Combinator's Winter 2020 (W20) batch, which speaks volumes about their innovation and potential.

**What They Offer**  
Tienda Crypto provides a range of services aimed at making crypto transactions as seamless as possible:

1. **Exchange for Individuals & Institutions**: Their platform is designed to facilitate trading for everyone, from casual users to larger institutions.
2. **APIs for Commerce**: This allows businesses to accept cryptocurrency payments easily—either online or through QR codes in physical settings. They can set pricing in pesos, dollars, or crypto.
3. **Over-the-Counter (OTC) Services**: They cater to large volume transactions with personalized support and competitive pricing.

**User-Friendly Experience**  
The ethos at Tienda Crypto is centered around user experience. They pioneer a streamlined process with instant transactions and a focus on security, ensuring that users can buy and sell their digital assets quickly and securely. Their commitment to exceptional customer service ensures that help is always just a click away.

**Get Started**  
Getting involved with Tienda Crypto is as easy as 1-2-3:
1. Create an account on their website.
2. Load your funds.
3. Start exploring and investing in cryptocurrencies.

**A Strong Community Backup**  
Tienda Crypto is supported by **nan** as their group partner, which enhances their credibility in the financial tech space. The company is tagged within the burgeoning 'fintech' and 'crypto-web3' sectors, indicating their alignment with contemporary technological trends.

**Conclusion**  
Tienda Crypto is not just a platform for buying and selling cryptocurrencies; it's a comprehensive tool for financial empowerment, especially tailored for the Latin American market. As they continue to grow and innovate, they're paving the way for greater adoption of crypto in everyday financial transactions.  

For more information, check out their website: [Tienda Crypto](https://www.tiendacrypto.com).
